name: 2020 Edition: Top10ner’s 1001 ‘Greatest’ Movies of All Time
description:
Official 2020 Edition:
Combined the average ratings (Critic's & Users) from IMDb, Rotten Tomatoes, Metacritic and Letterboxd, and then weighted and tweaked the results with general film data from iCheckMovies, Letterboxd, TSPDT? and IMDb to reveal the 1001 'Greatest' Movies of All Time.

**The original list created in 2015 can be found here: letterboxd.com/top10ner/list/2015-edition-top10ners-1001-greatest-movies/
